last_episode_to_air.name: The Devil's Den
last_episode_to_air.overview: A shattered Team Squad is left reeling as Gary and Avocato travel into Invictus' inner sanctum for the final showdown.

name: Final Space
overview: An astronaut named Gary and his planet-destroying sidekick Mooncake embark on serialized journeys through space in order to unlock the mystery of “Final Space,” the last point in the universe, if it actually does exist.

episodes.name: Chapter One
episodes.overview: Gary carries out the final days of his prison sentence aboard the Galaxy One, when he meets Mooncake, an alien who is being chased by bounty hunters; Gary swears to keep Mooncake safe, not knowing the alien is a planet-destroying super weapon.

episodes.name: Chapter Two
episodes.overview: Gary and Avocato must chase down the ruthless bounty hunter, Terk, before he can tell the Lord Commander that Mooncake is aboard the Galaxy One.

episodes.name: Chapter Three
episodes.overview: Gary tries to hide Mooncake safely away on the planet Yarno; Gary and Avocato are trapped in a terrifying mind-puzzle; Mooncake is forced to fight in a combat arena called the Deathcropolis; Quinn investigates the gravitational disturbance.

episodes.name: Chapter Four
episodes.overview: After the Galaxy One is hacked by the Infinity Guard, Gary has to harvest energy from a nearby star to reignite the engines; the radiation poisoning from the star sends Gary into a trance of painful memories; Gary and Quinn are finally reunited.

episodes.name: Chapter Five
episodes.overview: Quinn realizes the only people she can trust are Gary and the crew of the Galaxy One.

episodes.name: Chapter Six
episodes.overview: Gary goes on a mission to save Avocato's son, Little Cato, from Lord Commander's Prison Planet, but it turns out to be a trap; Quinn sees Gary's vlogs and understands that he is someone who would risk his life for any of his friends.

episodes.name: Chapter Seven
episodes.overview: Gary grapples with his future when he learns that his prison sentence is over.

episodes.name: Chapter Eight
episodes.overview: Gary and the crew encounter a Titan, who tells them how to close the breach in the fabric of space.

episodes.name: Chapter Nine
episodes.overview: Gary and Quinn go back to Earth to find an anti-gravitational bomb that can close the breach in space. Gary and Quinn decide to turn this life-threatening adventure into their first date.

episodes.name: Chapter Ten
episodes.overview: The finale to our epic adventure. An all out battle ensues as The Lord Commander does everything in his power to capture Mooncake, and stop Gary and Quinn from closing the entrance to Final Space.

episodes.name: The Toro Regatta
episodes.overview: Gary is rescued from the wreckage of space then must earn his freedom by winning the deadliest race in the galaxy.

episodes.name: The Happy Place
episodes.overview: The crew gets trapped in a happy ship where things aren't what they seem; Gary must confront the human cost of having lost Earth.

episodes.name: The Grand Surrender
episodes.overview: The search for a dimensional key leads the Crimson Light to Ash's home planet. HUE hosts a bachelor party for an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: The Other Side
episodes.overview: A collision with space time traps half of the Crimson Light in a perilous other dimension.

episodes.name: The Notorious Mrs. Goodspeed
episodes.overview: Gary reconnects with the mother who abandoned him; Mooncake misses Gary's attention.

episodes.name: Arachnitects
episodes.overview: When Mooncake is mysteriously taken from the Crimson Light, the crew must find him in the nether reaches of space; Tribore rebuilds the resistance.

episodes.name: The First Times They Met
episodes.overview: Nightfall attempts to bring the past back to life, leaving the crew powerless against a pack of evil KVNs.

episodes.name: The Remembered
episodes.overview: An unexpected trip through time provides a unique opportunity for the crew.

episodes.name: The Closer You Get
episodes.overview: Gary discovers a way he may be able to communicate with Quinn; Tribore reconnects with a resistance fighter who has an ulterior motive.

episodes.name: The Lost Spy
episodes.overview: Gary and crew search Galang 22 for Little Cato; Clarence, Fox and Ash pull off their greatest con; Sheryl's secrets come out.

episodes.name: The Set Up
episodes.overview: An act of betrayal shakes the crew; Hue and Mooncake have a day out for themselves.

episodes.name: The Descent Into Darkness
episodes.overview: The search for the stolen dimensional keys leads the crew to a planet being sucked into the Dark Zone; Hue and Ava get closer.

episodes.name: The Sixth Key
episodes.overview: With the dimensional keys recovered, the crew travel to Inner Space where they finally try to free Bolo.

episodes.name: ...And Into The Fire
episodes.overview: After a escaping a near death encounter with Invictus, The Team Squad begins their quest home inside the core of an unknown planet.

episodes.name: The Hidden Light
episodes.overview: Gary and Quinn encounter Earth's last survivor and search for a ship so that they can save the others lost in Final Space.

episodes.name: The Ventrexian
episodes.overview: The Lord Commander tries to pry information about Mooncake's whereabouts out of Avocato. Quinn keeps her sickness a secret from Gary.

episodes.name: One of Us
episodes.overview: Gary hatches another hair-brained plan to rescue his crew.

episodes.name: All the Moments Lost
episodes.overview: Final Space is such a hole.  I mean like its the biggest hole in the universe.  Like weight of a thousand suns kind of hole.  What I'm getting at is we are being sucked into a black hole and we're all definitely about to die.

episodes.name: Change is Gonna Come
episodes.overview: Gary and the crew race to find a cure for Quinn's Final Space poisoning, while Ash confronts Invictus. Meanwhile, Tribore and Quatronostro find out about a prophecy and journey to the great oracle Tim Belts.

episodes.name: The Chamber of Doubt
episodes.overview: As an infection grows within Bolo, the crew races to help before he's lost to them forever.

episodes.name: Forgiveness
episodes.overview: The aftermath of losing one of the crew ripples through the team squad.

episodes.name: Hyper-Transdimensional Bridge Rising
episodes.overview: The crew heads to Earth in an attempt to activate the Hyper-Trans Dimensional Bridge, but in order to do so they must make contact with someone on the other side of Final Space.

episodes.name: Until the Sky Falls
episodes.overview: Gary and Quinn go on a perilous mission to activate the Titan killing apparatus, while Avocato races to stop the Lord Commander's ultimate transformation.

episodes.name: The Dead Speak
episodes.overview: The crew fight to survive a ship-wide invasion of possessed Garys.

episodes.name: The Leaving
episodes.overview: Long held secrets are revealed that will change the Team Squad forever.

episodes.name: The Devil's Den
episodes.overview: A shattered Team Squad is left reeling as Gary and Avocato travel into Invictus' inner sanctum for the final showdown.
